subject: Automobile Racing
Free Agents (Sports)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart, Nascar’s two-time champion, is back on top as a highly coveted free agent who has triggered a bidding war that could lure him away from Joe Gibbs Racing.
snippet: Tony Stewart, Nascar’s two-time champion, is back on top as a highly coveted free agent who has triggered a bidding war that could lure him away from Joe Gibbs Racing.
